About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9:30-11:30am or by appointment; closed weekends. Reference assistance available in person. No copying services available.

About.Access: Minimum 1 day's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Any material relating to the history of Ravensthorpe Shire.

Contact.Street address: Dance Cottage Museum, Morgans Street, Ravensthorpe 6346
